description: aluminum folded bank in the shape of a bank building; red slanted roof with shingles; green slanted foot; figures of kids around exterior going to the bank's window, which says "Closed"; knob at front opens bank and sticks red disc out to accept coins; image of bank teller appears as well; trigger at left front closes bank and takes coin
marks:
Inscriptions and Sticker

sign on sliding front
title: "Bank Closed" mechanical bank
